titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 592) to redesignate Great Kills Park in the Gateway National Recreation Area as "World War II Veterans Park at Great Kills".

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-209, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 592 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. makes in order the Committee on Resources amendment in the nature of a substitute as an original bill for purpose of amendment. Waives clause 7 of rule XVI (prohibiting nongermane amendments). Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 77.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 231.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/29/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 592 (Great Kills Park redesignation).
